title: How long does it take to upload a 1-hour video on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's depend on your internet speed especially uploading speed and the device quality where you are uploading your video and also depends on video quality and format . if you have at least uploading speed of 10 Mbps or above then 1 hour long video of 1080p uploads almost in 15 to 20 minutes easily. 4k videos mostly takes longer time to upload .

It all depends on the uploading speed of your network. Can't say that it will take standard fix time for upload beacase different areas having the different uploading speed. Uploading speed is the key factor here. Thanks for asking nyc question by the way 👌🏻
